content.title: Draws
content.text:
Here you can find a lot of my first hobby : drawing
I'm a drawer since I have 3, and I love to draw.
I recently bough a Galaxy Note 8, and it's a powerfull tool to create drawing in the train or in the doctor room...
I'm using a lot of tools to draw :
- Black pen as Copic Multiliner SP (from .003 to BS)
- laser jet paper (You can use alcool marker easily without creating hole in your paper !
- Copic markers, alcool markers, ideal to colorise quickly without making a lot of lines as with reynolds markers...
